attributes.action: to order a review into unethical adoption of quality standards from the USA regarding dangerous substances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Substances like aspartame seem to have licensed there way from the USA to Europe when originally denied by Europe. There really has got to be an investigation.
For example think of all the poor single pearent mothers buying products with aspartame included when everone else seems not to want to touch the stuff with a barge pool. How many times have you walk past a shelf with loads of diet drinks still there and stock of everything else going fast. This sort of Americanisation really discriminates poorer people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
